Package org.mule.extension.mule.hashicorp.vault.internal

Class HashicorpConnectionProvider

java.lang.Object
org.mule.extension.mule.hashicorp.vault.internal.HashicorpConnectionProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mule.runtime.api.connection.ConnectionProvider<HashicorpConnection>, org.mule.runtime.api.connection.PoolingConnectionProvider<HashicorpConnection>, org.mule.runtime.api.connection.PoolingListener<HashicorpConnection>, org.mule.runtime.api.lifecycle.Initialisable
public class HashicorpConnectionProvider extends Object implements org.mule.runtime.api.lifecycle.Initialisable, org.mule.runtime.api.connection.PoolingConnectionProvider<HashicorpConnection>
Provider to resolve properties from HashiCorp Vault.

This provider returns the value of the expression to the one corresponding to the configuration file.

Since:
1.0
